name: angle-input
description: Angle input for jQuery, React, and vanilla JavaScript

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp index.js dist/angle-input.js && cp react.js dist/angle-input.react.js && cp index.js dist/angle-input.jquery.js
scripts.deps: rm -rf deps && mkdir deps && cp node_modules/react/dist/react.js deps && cp node_modules/react-dom/dist/react-dom.js deps

author: Chris Andrejewski <christopher.andrejewski@gmail.com>
